about_the_game:
What if you were the sole survivor after a crash landing on Mars? In Beyond The Earth, you will not only fight for survival on the unforgiving red planet but also dive into a gripping narrative that runs parallel to your survival journey. With fully voiced characters and immersive dialogues, the story comes to life, making every decision you make feel important.

Realistic Survival on Mars

Mars is not just a barren wasteland; it’s a planet that challenges your every move. The game offers a hyper-realistic environment: low gravity, harsh weather conditions, dynamic dust storms, and whirlwinds. You must constantly monitor your suit’s pressure, oxygen levels, and the planet's ever-changing conditions in real-time. Your main objective is survival, but it won’t be easy.

A Captivating Storyline

Beyond The Earth is one of the few survival games where the narrative takes center stage. You are not just building bases and collecting resources—you are unraveling the mysteries of past expeditions and the fate of those who arrived on Mars before you. Fully voiced characters add depth to the game, enhancing the atmosphere of loneliness and despair. Every dialogue, every voice echoing across the Martian landscape, will accompany you in this perilous mission.

Freedom and Colony Development

While the story unfolds, you have the freedom to explore Mars at your own pace. Build your colony, upgrade it through a unique crafting system, and develop infrastructure to terraform the planet. Every action brings you closer to transforming Mars into a habitable world.

Battling Against Mars

The planet’s natural conditions won’t give you a moment's peace. Nightfall brings storms, dust storms, and radiation hazards. Your equipment can fail at any time, and oxygen can run out at the worst possible moment. Be prepared for an endless battle against the planet itself.

Key Features:

  • Realistic Survival Mechanics: Physics, gravity, pressure, and weather conditions are all based on real-world science.

  • Deep Storyline with Full Voice Acting: Immerse yourself in a narrative that unfolds alongside your survival.

  • Crafting and Base Building: Create tools, structures, and infrastructure to terraform Mars.

  • Open-Ended Gameplay: Explore, survive, and build at your own pace.

  • Evolving Martian Ecosystem: Adapt the planet to your needs, turning it into the colony of the future.

Welcome to Mars. Your mission has only just begun, and every step you take could be your last.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Beyond The Earth – strategy game powered by Unreal Engine 5 where you and your team transform Mars into a thriving world. Build bases, extract rare resources, and develop technologies. Battle the planet's harsh conditions and create a new home for humanity together!
